answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Jack - the Alliance for Innovation doesn't have a webinar today??


Jack - the Alliance for Innovation doesn't have a webinar today??

answers.author: Ruth Wallace
answers.text:
I was unable to sign into the free ICMA webinar today on Sustainable Stormwater Management, even though I pre-registered early.  Was disappointed.


I was unable to sign into the free ICMA webinar today on Sustainable Stormwater Management, even though I pre-registered early.  Was disappointed.


Save Changes
Cancel

answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Jack and Ruth, 
I'm sorry that you were unable to access the webinar while it was live. However it is available for free on the ICMA University website and you should be able to log in and access it from there. Here is a link to the main page and you will find the webinar under available webinars and then sustainability. http://learning.icma.org/store/provider/provider09.php
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Jack Wright
text:

Jack
title: Webinar Access
